Reproducibility.in.Plant.Pathology: A Systematic Quantitative Review of Articles Providing a Basis for Identifying Reproducible Research Efforts the Field of Plant Pathology

Source: R/Reproducibility.in.Plant.Pathology-package.R
Reproducibility.in.Plant.Pathology-package.Rd

A research compendium for the letter to the editor, "Reproducibility in plant pathology: where do we stand and a way forward", published in "xxxxxx".
